title: Add mobile-responsive design

requirements.text: Implement responsive layout for the home page hero section and feature cards to adapt to mobile screen sizes (320px-768px)

quotes: can you make this mobile-accessible as well

acceptanceCriteria: Hero section stacks vertically on mobile devices
Feature cards reflow to single column on screens below 768px
Text remains readable without horizontal scrolling
Touch targets meet minimum 44x44px size

requirements.text: Make the application header (AppHeader) responsive with collapsible navigation for mobile devices

quotes: can you make this mobile-accessible as well

acceptanceCriteria: Navigation menu collapses into a hamburger icon on mobile
All header actions remain accessible on small screens
Logo and branding scale appropriately
Login button and profile controls are touch-friendly

requirements.text: Optimize team list and team detail pages for mobile viewing with responsive grids and touch-optimized controls

quotes: can you make this mobile-accessible as well

acceptanceCriteria: Team grid adapts to 1-2 columns on mobile
Team icons and cards scale appropriately for small screens
Join request button and team actions are touch-accessible
Video gallery displays properly on mobile with appropriate sizing

requirements.text: Make forms and modals (profile setup, team creation, file uploaders) mobile-friendly with proper touch interactions

quotes: can you make this mobile-accessible as well

acceptanceCriteria: Input fields are appropriately sized for mobile keyboards
Modals fit within mobile viewport without overflow

requirements.text: Ensure inbox and dashboard pages are fully responsive with readable mail content and accessible action buttons on mobile

quotes: can you make this mobile-accessible as well

acceptanceCriteria: Mail list and content adapt to mobile layout
